title: Min Stack
statement: Design a stack that supports push, pop, top, and retrieving the minimum element in constant time.
input_format:
First line contains N (number of operations).
Next N lines contain operations: PUSH x, POP, TOP, or GETMIN.
output_format:
For TOP: print the top element or -1 if empty.
For GETMIN: print the minimum element or -1 if empty.
